definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The verification and measurement plan of checking fixture dimension should be confirmed by YFV engineer.
sentences.chinese: 检具的尺寸验证测量计划需得到延锋工程师的确认。

sentences.english: We can measure half a period.
It has a set of changeable spindles with wide measuring range.
sentences.chinese: 备有一组可换接杆，测量范围大。

sentences.english: A must for the amateur anthropologist who seeks to guage the feromonic field.
sentences.chinese: 为业余人类学家在测量领域寻求轨迹而准备的物品。

sentences.english: Now, in practice, it depends on how good your measurement is.
sentences.chinese: 在实践中，它取决于你的测量方法有多高明。

sentences.english: Temperature taking is intrusive and will upset the child.
sentences.chinese: 测量体温是对小儿烦扰，会使小儿不安。

sentences.english: This text introduces a measure system based on Single chip which can monitor displacements of the paper cutter.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种基于单片机的切纸机位移测量系统。

sentences.english: The measuring rate is about 188 data per minute.
sentences.chinese: 测量速度约为每分钟188个数据。

sentences.english: I am going to Haverhill to-morrow, surveying, for a week or more.
sentences.chinese: 我明天要去黑佛希尔测量，大约得一个多星期。

sentences.english: The survey principle of a magneto ignition system ignition advance angle was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了磁电机点火系统的点火提前角测量原理。

sentences.english: One is a spectrometer that measures sunlight reflected from the Earth's surface.
sentences.chinese: 一个是光谱仪，它测量从地球表面反射的阳光。

sentences.english: Anomalous refraction is believed to be the main error source for classical astrometry.
sentences.chinese: 反常折射已成为传统天体测量学的主要误差来源。

sentences.english: A trolley equipment for rail profile measurement is developed.
sentences.chinese: 研制了一种手推式钢轨外形几何尺寸测量系统。

sentences.english: The Works shall be measured, and valued for payment, in accordance with this Clause.
sentences.chinese: 应对工程依据本款进行测量并确定其支付价值。
剩余的时间是可以测量的。

sentences.english: Isothermal chamber is a new kind of measuring installment used to test pneumatic component flow rate characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 等温容器是一种新型气动元件流量特性测量装置。

definition: to proofread and correct/to edit and rectify/to correct/to calibrate
to stake out (the boundaries of a property etc)/to demarcate/(engineering etc) to calibrate
to interpret (a visual document, a medical exam, an historical event etc)/to analyze data (from a chip, a black box etc)
